history.text: I just watched this great movie Despicable Me.

It's this well reviewed movie where the main character is actually a villain
.
I also just watched the film recently.
Oh, what did you think of it?
I really like how the supervillain is at the forefront but it wasnt a dark movie it kept me laughing.
What did you think of the animation?
Yeah I liked that about the villian as well, I thought the animation wasn't the best Pixar has done but it was definately up there.
The 3D was nice, but I agree about the quality of the animation.
Yeah the 3D was a neat feature.

Pixar made the movie for the kids, but its a film that adults could enjoy 
and sit through.
Oh, definately I love how they do that with their movies!
I think my favorite charactor out of the whole movie was Dr. Nefario. How about you?

I liked Dr. Nefario,  but I think my favorite char
acter was Victor Perkins
What did you think of the music? I think the songs by Pharrell were perfect for the movie.
I agree!
I loved how they used the song to interact with the plot.
The minions characters also added a lot to the film.
Yeah they offered up quite a bit of quick-witted humor.
It was a nice twist when Gru plans to leave the girls, but then he doesn't when he  becomes closer.
Yeah, I like how the whole movie is really about him turning into a good guy.
What do you think about Steve Carell playing Gru? I think it was an excellent choice for the character.
Yes, I thought him being the main actor in this movie led to a lot of the punch lines in this movie.
I was surprised when the girls offered their piggy bank to Gru.
Yeah that was really hear warming. I also thought it was interesting to watch Gru's development as he struggled between villian and dad.
Absolutely. This is displayed especially when Gru had to rescue the girls in mid air.
Yes I agree, do you think the reviews accurately described the quality of the movie.

Yes i think its pretty accurate from details of the scenes to the amusement of the fil
m.
I concur.
Is there anything you would change about the film ratings listed from Rotten Tomatoes ?
I would make it a little higher, but overall those kinds of scores tend to be lower so it makes sense.
I agree with that.

uid2response.feedback: I really like this conversation platform.
